author: Zoe Tidman, Zoe Tidman
title: Coronavirus: 21-year-old 'becomes youngest victim'
description: 'To all the people that thinks it's just a virus, please think again,' mother says
content:
A 21-year-old woman has reportedly become the UKs youngest coronavirus victim. 
Chloe Middleton, from Buckinghamshire, died after testing positive for Covid-19, according to her family. 
She had no apparent underlying health conditions, they have claimed. … [+1927 chars]
